# mapMissing(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a new column, potentially with missing elements, by applying the given thread-safe transform to every element of the column, including missing elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func mapMissing<T>(_ lazyTransform: @escaping (Element?) -> T?) -> MLDataColumn<T> where T : MLDataValueConvertible
```

## Parameters

- **lazyTransform**: A thread-safe element transformation function. The implementation of the transform you provide should accept an `Element` of the column and return a transformed value of a type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataValueConvertible]. If the transform returns `nil` for a given element, the corresponding element in the new column will have a missing value.

## Return Value

A new column.

## Transforming elements to generate a column

- **map(_:)**: Creates a new column by applying the given thread-safe transform to every non-missing element of this column.
